Power.name: Adrenaline Boost
Power.notes: +2 Initiative/Level for current Combat Turn. Level Drain following turn.

Power.name: Combat Sense
Power.notes: +1 d.p.m./level to defense tests against ranged and melee attacks. Always allowed a Perception Test before possible surprise situations.

Power.name: Critical Strike (Skill)
Power.notes: +1 DV for attacks with Unarmed Combat,Clubs,Blades, Astral Combat, Exotic Melee Weapon (choose one)

Power.name: Danger Sense
Power.notes: +1 d.p.m./level on Surprise Tests

Power.name: Enhanced Perception
Power.notes: +1 d.p.m./level to all Perception and Assensing Tests

Power.name: Enhanced Accuracy
Power.notes: +1 Accuracy to Attacks with chosen combat skill

Power.name: Improved Ability (Skill)
Power.notes: +1 to Skill Rating/level. max new level is current level*1.5(rounded up)

Power.name: Improved Physical Attribute
Power.notes: choose body, agility, reaction or strength. +1 per level

Power.name: Improved Potential
Power.notes: Buy once for either Physical, Mental, or Social limit +1

Power.name: Improved Reflexes 1
Power.notes: +1 to Reaction, +1D6 Initiative

Power.name: Improved Reflexes 2
Power.notes: +2 to Reaction, +2D6 Initiative

Power.name: Improved Reflexes 3
Power.notes: +3 to Reaction, +3D6 Initiative

Power.name: Kinesics
Power.notes: +1 d.p.m/level to resist Social Tests and tests to read your emotions (Judge Intentions, Assensing, etc)

Power.name: Light Body
Power.notes: +1 d.p.m./level to Gymnastics Test when making a jump. Use Agility+Level when calculation maximum jump distance. Reduce fall distance by level when calculating fall damage.

Power.name: Missile Parry
Power.notes: +1 d.p.m/level to defense pool against an attackers ranged attack test. If you succeed, you pluck the missile out of the air.

Power.name: Mystic Armor
Power.notes: +1 point of Armor per Level. Also in astral combat.

Power.name: Natural Immunity
Power.notes: +1 d.p.m./level to resist toxins and disease.

Power.name: Pain Resistance
Power.notes: +2 d.p.m./level on any tests to withstand suffering. Condition Monitor wound modifiers move one box per level.

Power.name: Rapid Healing
Power.notes: +1 d.p.m./level to Body for Healing Tests. +1 d.p.m/level to any tests made to heal you.

Power.name: Spell Resistance
Power.notes: +1 d.p.m./level to Resistance Tests against spells, spell rituals, preparations, or Innate Spell critter powers.

Power.name: Traceless Walk
Power.notes: -4 d.p.m. to any hearing based Perception Test to detect you. -2 d.p.m. to any non-visual Track Tests to track you. You leave no visible traces and make no noise through contact to the floor.

Power.name: Voice Control
Power.notes: Impersonation+Charisma+Level[Mental] against Perception+Intuition/Voice recognition Device Rating*2, when trying to trick or fool someone. +1 d.p.m/level to Social Limit.
